column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Communicate Freely with People
#Text=Communication is the basic asset of human beings .
#Text=It 's our ability to speak and communicate freely that makes us a superior race .
#Text=But most people fail to harbor the courage to talk open minded with people they have first met or strangers in any place .
#Text=We often feel alone inside metro , buses , parks or a new institution .
#Text=Being able to approach new persons saves us from that awkward times that we often face when we do n't know anyone we are looking at .
#Text=Communication for some is like Maggie noodles ; we just need 2 minutes a top .
#Text=But , it can also become a tedious task for introverts and shy persons .
#Text=It 's very rewarding instead , if you have the guts to make the first move .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Keep your attitude right .
#Text=Your first impression is not the last impression .
#Text=When you enter a new place , say , your school or college , or even your workplace , its obvious to feel nervous .
#Text=Do n't worry so are the others . you just need to show that you 're scared too .
#Text=They have seen you for the first time so try not to flaunt yourself , instead ; be yourself .
#Text=Think them as already your friends .
#Text=Make yourself comfortable .
#Text=Relations are not sent by God , so try to adjust in whichever seat you get .
#Text=Making access to other 's choices is also important to show you care .
#Text=You need not argue with someone for the best seat .
#Text=If you want a particular place for yourself like the front seat or the middle one then just be sure to come a little early the next day .
#Text=Making tantrums the very first day is n't a good idea to present yourself .
#Text=Be the first to approach .
#Text=The person beside you or in front of you is seeing you for the first time .
#Text=Just act normal and introduce yourself , like " Hi , I 'm Sasha and you ?
